LOL. *britis accent* Your arm's gone.

I also just realized I forgot to post damage for the four earlier
shots.

::Galaxor::

Now smiling with success, Galaxor slashes as hard as he can at
Abominus's midsection. His chest was burning from the four shots
Abominus had shot earlier, and his armor was very cracked at places,
but he ignores the pain.




--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Soulstice Omega" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> OOC: Well, Zardus, you don't have to try to be good and still be
good.
> (Smiles cheesily) Anyway, I guess I can post damage.
> 
> BIC: Abominus get's his arm up just in time and his arm is hit, but
as he
> ducks, POP! Off comes the arm. Blot was now seperated from
Abominus...
